edu.mines.csci598.recycler.backend
Class InputEvent

java.lang.Object
  edu.mines.csci598.recycler.backend.InputEvent

public final class InputEvent
extends java.lang.Object

Describes a single input event. Any input consists of at least a type and an index, and may have associated coordinates depending on the type.

          A gesture in which the user jumps.

          The X coordinate to which an element has moved, if any
 float y

Field Detail

TYPE_BODY_MOVEMENT

public static final int TYPE_BODY_MOVEMENT
Indicates that the body specified by index has moved. x contains the new location of that body.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TYPE_POINTER_MOVEMENT

public static final int TYPE_POINTER_MOVEMENT

See Also:
Constant Field Values

TYPE_GESTURE

public static final int TYPE_GESTURE
Indicates that the gesture specified by index (see GESTURE_* constants below) has been detected. The coordinates are undefined.
